Get in touch

Allport Logistics and Haulage International Limited is a fully registered Customs Licensed Clearing and forwarding Company situated in Lagos, Nigeria. As a clearing agent in lagos, we have a shipping industry experience for more than 20 years, we have handled jobs for different clients from small start-ups to big corporations.

Lagos Office

Nnewi Building, 1/3 Creek Road,
Apapa, Lagos State/LA
Contact Phone: +2349038830273

More of ALHS

1 We make imports/exports simple!

As one of the most efficient clearing agents in Nigeria, we act as your guide through the often complicated import process. Each step of the way we act on yoour behalf, clearing your goods through Nigeria Customs.

2 We are established just for you.

ALHS was established to provide the importing and Exporting community in Nigeria with a dedicated, independent, reliable and economical Customs clearance service.

3 All Ports, One Contact, One Call.

Because we provide an "All Ports, One Contact, One Call" policy you will benefit by receiving a uniform quality of service, whichever port you will be dealing with.
